name: SpongeBob SquarePants: big races |DEMO|
description:
Meet the FIRST EPIC SpongeBob SquarePants racing game!!! 

This is the FREE demo game where you can play with your friends online. Demo includes: 

  • 4 different karts with different stats!
  • 2 crazy tracks!
  • 2 fundamentaly different game modes!
  • ability to play with the keyboard and ps4 controller.
  • And more...

To make the full version better, please leave the feedback :)

Controls  For keyboard                                                       For ps4 controller W - drive forwardCross - drive forwardS - drive backwardCircle - drive backwardA - turn leftRight stick left - turn leftD - turn rightRight stick right - turn rightHold space with A/D - turn with driftHold R1 with right stick incline - turn with driftShift with charged power up - use power upL1 with charged power up - use power upShift not with charged power up - honkL1 not with charged power up - honkLeft alt - look back
Arrow back - look backEscape - pauseOptions - pause
